channel.title: Silicon Graphics on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Silicon Graphics on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Silicon Persistence
item.description: Hey all, Ernie here with a recent piece of mine that also showed up in Motherboard. In case you haven’t read it yet, it’s a good one and highlights both SGI and the the excellent community IRIX.cc. Read on, and hope you dig! Today in Tedium: Recently, I was faced with an unusual question about a piece of hardware that very few people have ever used. The question: What makes a giant workstation, one that once cost as much as a house when it was first produced in the early â€˜90s and makes as much noise as a vacuum, so appealing to a 16-year-old?
